Introduction

Emma is a South Korean-Canadian dancer, rapper, and choreographer under BPM Entertainment. She is best known as the oldest member of the girl group BADVILLAIN.

On August 24, 2021, Emma appeared on Mnet's dance survival show "Street Woman Fighter". She was eliminated with her dance crew WANT in the 6th episode, placing 7th overall in the show.

On May 16, 2024, Emma was revealed as the fifth member of BADVILLAIN. The group officially debuted on June 3, 2024, with their debut single album "OVERSTEP".
